metadata.Title: CVE-2015-0886 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - high
metadata.Description:
Integer overflow in the crypt_raw method in the key-stretchingimplementation in jBCrypt before 0.4 makes it easier for remote attackersto determine cleartext values of password hashes via a brute-force attackagainst hashes associated with the maximum exponent.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-0886` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjbcrypt-java - 0.4-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libjbcrypt-java package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.4-2').
